組.definition: to form; to organize; group; team; classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

組分.definition: components; individual parts making up a compound

組合.definition: to assemble; to combine; to compose; combination; association; set; compilation; (math.) combinatorial

組合拳.definition: a combination of punches; (fig.) a set of measures

組合音響.definition: hi-fi system; stereo sound system; abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]

組團.definition: to form a group or delegation

組委.definition: organizational committee; abbr. for 組織委員會|组织委员会

組屋.definition: HDB flats; public apartment flats (in Singapore and Malaysia)

組建.definition: to organize; to set up; to establish

組成.definition: to form; to make up; to constitute

組織.definition: to organize; organization; (biology) tissue; (textiles) weave; CL:個|个[ge4]

組織委員會.definition: organizing committee; abbr. to 組委|组委

組織胞漿菌病.pinyin: zu3 zhi1 bao1 jiang1 jun1 bing4

組胺.definition: histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)

組隊.definition: to team up (with); to put a team together
